articles.title: Oxford Covid-19 vaccine Q&A: what do the results show so far, and what happens next? - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: Interim results from phase 3 trial show the vaccine is up to 90 per cent effective
articles.content:
Does it differ to Pfizer and Moderna's vaccines?
